about_the_game:
Your old climbing friend found out about a surprisingly unusual mountain and invited you to get to its top with him. However, it's not that simple!

BE VIGILANT

During the ascent, your companions will be:

  • darkness

  • unpredictable weather

  • wind

  • rockfall

  • temperature differences

and other dangers that can put an end to your ascent.

BE PATIENT

You only have 100 health units, which is very easy to reset. After each death, you will start climbing from the bottom.

BE REASONABLE

Your path to the top is your personal choice. But you will need resources to move between the stone ledges, or to immediately pave the way to the top ahead. You will have access to:

  • wood

  • stone

  • iron

To extract resources, you can accordingly:

  • To cut down trees

  • to mine a stone with a pickaxe

  • to extract iron from stone deposits, also with a pickaxe

BE CREATIVE

There will be a whole crafting menu at your service, where you can create items from the extracted resources to choose from:

  • rope - for long-distance travel

  • safety net - for safety against falls from a great height

  • trampoline - to accelerate the ascent and protect against falling from a low height

  • torch - for orientation in the dark

HAVE A REST

You can stop almost anywhere and get out - your progress will be saved, or you can just listen to the sounds of nature, or your interlocutor on the radio.

DON'T FORGET

  • Each time you exit the game, the progress is saved. Every time you die, you start from the bottom.

  • monitor the condition of your character

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • Processor: apple m1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

name: Death Climbing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Get to the top of a huge mountain with unpredictable conditions using its resources.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
